text: Jesse Feras Klaver (born May 1, 1986 in Roosendaal) is a Dutch politician of GreenLeft (GL). He has been political leader since 2015. He has been a member of the Second Chamber since 2010 and parliamentary leader since 2015. Previously he was chair of CNV Youth and a member of the Social-Economic Council. Klaver is partly of Moroccan and Indonesian descent. == References == * Bio at Parlement.com == Other websites == * Bio at the House of Representatives of The Netherlands Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch trade unionists Category:GreenLeft politicians Category:Leaders of political parties in the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from North Brabant
title: Jesse Klaver
